targets.query: SELECT count("ifOperStatus") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifOperStatus" = 1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifOperStatus") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifOperStatus" = 2) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifSpeed") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifSpeed" = 10000000000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifSpeed") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifSpeed" = 1000000000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifSpeed") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifSpeed" = 100000000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifSpeed") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifSpeed" = 10000000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifInErrors") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifInErrors" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifOutErrors") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifOutErrors" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifLastChange") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) < 60) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifLastChange") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) > 60 AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) < 3600) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifLastChange") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) > 3600 AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) < 86400) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifLastChange") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) > 86400 AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) < 604800) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT count("ifLastChange") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND("ifLastChange" / 100) > 604800 AND ("ifLastChange" / 100) < 18144000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)

targets.alias: Ports with more 1 month Last Change
targets.query: SELECT count("ifLastChange") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND("ifLastChange" / 100) > 18144000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)

SELECT last("ifOperStatus") AS "Status", last("ifSpeed") AS "Speed", last("ifLastChange") / 100 AS "LastChange", last("ifInErrors") AS "InErrors", last("ifOutErrors") AS "OutErrors", last("ifInOctets") + last("ifOutOctets") AS "Transmitted" FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ifIndex", "ifDescr", "ifPhysAddress"
SELECT mean("ifInErrors") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifIndex" =~ /^$port$/) AND $timeFilter AND "ifInErrors" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifIndex" fill(null)
SELECT mean("ifOutErrors") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifIndex" =~ /^$port$/) AND $timeFilter AND "ifOutErrors" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifIndex" fill(null)
SELECT  abs(derivative(mean("ifInOctets"), 1s)) *8 FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifIndex" =~ /^$port$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifIndex" fill(null)
SELECT abs(derivative(mean("ifOutOctets"), 1s)) *-8 FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifIndex" =~ /^$port$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifIndex" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "ifIndex"
list.label: Port
list.name: port
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "ifIndex"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "agent_host"
list.label: IP Switch
list.name: ip
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "agent_host"
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "agent_host" WHERE entPhysicalName= '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "entPhysicalName"
